verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> you live <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> but do not see, <S%H7200><s%> ears <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> but do not hear; <S%H8085><s%> for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

"Therefore, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> for yourself baggage <S%H3627><s%> for exile <S%H1473><s%> and go <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight; <S%H5869><s%> even go <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> from your place <S%H4725><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%> Perhaps <S%H194><s%> they will understand <S%H7200><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

"And bring <S%H3318><s%> your baggage <S%H3627><s%> out by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as baggage <S%H3627><s%> for exile. <S%H1473><s%> Then you will go <S%H3318><s%> out at evening <S%H6153><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as those going <S%H4161><s%> into exile. <S%H1473><s%>
"Dig <S%H2864><s%> a hole through the wall <S%H7023><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> out through it.

"Load <S%H5375><s%> [the baggage] on [your] shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> [and] carry <S%H3318><s%> [it] out in the dark. <S%H5939><s%> You shall cover <S%H3680><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> so that you can not see <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> for I have set <S%H5414><s%> you as a sign <S%H4159><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

And I did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> as I had been commanded. <S%H6680><s%> By day <S%H3119><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> out my baggage <S%H3627><s%> like the baggage <S%H3627><s%> of an exile. <S%H1473><s%> Then in the evening <S%H6153><s%> I dug <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> with my hands; <S%H3027><s%> I went <S%H3318><s%> out in the dark <S%H5939><s%> [and] carried <S%H5375><s%> [the baggage] on [my] shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> has not the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, 'What <S%H4100><s%> are you doing <S%H6213><s%>?'

"Say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> burden <S%H9294><s%> [concerns] the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> as well as all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in it. "'

"Say, <S%H559><s%> 'I am a sign <S%H4159><s%> to you. As I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> it will be done <S%H6213><s%> to them; they will go <S%H1980><s%> into exile, <S%H1473><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>'

"And the prince <S%H5387><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> them will load <S%H5375><s%> [his baggage] on [his] shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in the dark <S%H5939><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> out. They will dig <S%H2864><s%> a hole through the wall <S%H7023><s%> to bring <S%H3318><s%> [it] out. He will cover <S%H3680><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> so <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> that he can not see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with [his] eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

"I shall also spread <S%H6566><s%> My net <S%H7568><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him, and he will be caught <S%H8610><s%> in My snare. <S%H9287><s%> And I shall bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> yet he will not see <S%H7200><s%> it, though he will die <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

"And I shall scatter <S%H2219><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are around <S%H5439><s%> him, his helpers <S%H5828><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his troops; <S%H102><s%> and I shall draw <S%H9553><s%> out a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.
"So they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> when I scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and spread <S%H2219><s%> them among the countries. <S%H776><s%>

"But I shall spare <S%H3498><s%> a few <S%H4557><s%> of them from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> that they may tell <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations <S%H8441><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they go, <S%H935><s%> and may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
Moreover, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> with trembling, <S%H7494><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your water <S%H4325><s%> with quivering <S%H7269><s%> and anxiety. <S%H1674><s%>

"Then say <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> concerning the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" They will eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> with anxiety <S%H1674><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> their water <S%H4325><s%> with horror, <S%H8078><s%> because <S%H4616><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> will be stripped <S%H3456><s%> of its fulness <S%H4393><s%> on account <S%H6440><s%> of the violence <S%H2555><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in it.

"And the inhabited <S%H3427><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> will be laid <S%H2717><s%> waste, <S%H2717><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> will be a desolation. <S%H8077><s%> So you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"' "
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4912><s%> you [people] have concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The days <S%H3117><s%> are long <S%H748><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> fails'?

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will make this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4912><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> so that they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> use <S%H9301><s%> it as a proverb <S%H9301><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%> "But tell <S%H1696><s%> them, "The days <S%H3117><s%> draw <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> as well as the fulfillment <S%H1697><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> vision. <S%H2377><s%>

"For there will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be any <S%H3605><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> or flattering <S%H2509><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"For I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall speak, <S%H1696><s%> and whatever <S%H834><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> I speak <S%H1696><s%> will be performed. <S%H6213><s%> It will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be delayed, <S%H4900><s%> for in your days, <S%H3117><s%> O rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> and perform <S%H6213><s%> it," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>' "
Furthermore, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The vision <S%H2377><s%> that he sees <S%H2372><s%> is for many <S%H7227><s%> years <S%H3117><s%> [from now,] and he prophesies <S%H5012><s%> of times <S%H6256><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> off. <S%H7350><s%>'

"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of My words <S%H1697><s%> will be delayed <S%H4900><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> longer. <S%H5750><s%> Whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> I speak <S%H1696><s%> will be performed, <S%H6213><s%>"'" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
